rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious yet modest entryway featuring a Vastu-compliant orientation (facing North for auspiciousness) that transitions into the living space.

rooms.name: Living-Dining Area
rooms.description: A combined Mediterranean styled living and dining area with built-in seating and a central open kitchen to keep the space versatile yet budget-friendly.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact, efficient kitchen integrated within the living-dining area with energy-saving fixtures and storage solutions; designed for a joint family with shared cooking responsibilities.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A versatile bedroom accommodating one or two occupants with Vastu-compliant placement (preferably East for personal energy). It can serve as a shared space in the joint family arrangement.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A small additional bedroom allocated to visitors or extended family members; designed using cost-effective materials and flexible furniture arrangements.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom with dual sinks to accommodate the needs of a joint family. Incorporates Vastu guidelines by ensuring water features are aligned.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A sturdy, weather-resistant door that provides secure entry into the property.

openings.name: Window to Living-Dining Area
openings.description: Large windows allowing natural light and a Mediterranean breeze; strategically placed in alignment with Vastu, preferably facing East or North.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Access
openings.description: A door leading directly to the swimming pool on the rear side of the property. The access is designed considering budget constraints and Vastu flow.

vastu_considerations.kitchen_position: South to avoid interference with dining area
vastu_considerations.bedrooms_placement: East, West or North based on family needs and Vastu guidelines
vastu_considerations.water_features: Located in the northern part of the property

budget_constraints.energy_efficiency: Incorporate energy-saving fixtures in kitchen and lighting

mediterranean_elements.architectural_style: Mediterranean aesthetics with tiled flooring, warm color palettes, and arched windows.
mediterranean_elements.roof_design: Low-pitched roofline reminiscent of Mediterranean townhouses
mediterranean_elements.facades: Stucco or brick finishes combined with wooden elements

corner_plot_adaptations.layout_adjustment: The plan is adapted to maximize exposure on two sides, allowing for increased natural light and air circulation.
corner_plot_adaptations.pool_positioning: The swimming pool is placed at the rear corner of the property to maintain privacy while offering ample outdoor space.

joint_family_features.shared_spaces: Open living-dining area for communal interaction
joint_family_features.flexible_rooms: Rooms with multipurpose design to accommodate family members over time
joint_family_features.storage_solutions: Integrated storage solutions in each room
